name: Demon's Path
description:
Demon's Path is a classic turn based RPG, an italian tribute to masterpieces like Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest.

Play after a big war between Humans and Demons with two different point of views and discover the truth behind the cycle of hatred and war in a long journey with 8 characters and several hidden allies that you can find all over the world.

Story-driven but also open world (since mid-game) with main and side quests, over 200 weapons, 500 armor pieces, 200 items, 300 enemies, 100 locations ,50 hours of gameplay and TONS of lore and secrets!

Only Italian language.
